title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 will get ‘up to’ four years of Wear OS updates
content:
Surrounding its Galaxy S22 unveil yesterday, Samsung also announced a new update policy that leads the Android market. As it turns out, that policy will also extend to the Galaxy Watch 4, which will be getting Wear OS updates for the next four years.

more…

The post Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 will get ‘up to’ four years of Wear OS updates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has confirmed the timeline at which the Galaxy Watch 4 will get updates, with "up to" four years of Wear OS upgrades.
